Ella atiende su negocio desde en la mañana pues la mayoría de sus clientes siempre quedan satisfechos con sus servicios. Ella es una persona muy amable y que ha aprendido bastante con los créditos que ha realizado. Ella solicita este nuevo crédito para la compra de motor y mantenimiento para sus molinos.
texts.en:
Francisca Enriqueta is 43 years old. Her business is providing milling services. She tends her business from early in the morning, and the majority of her customers are always satisfied with her services. She is a very friendly person who has learned a great deal through the loans she has had.
 
She is applying for this new loan in order to buy a motor, and to pay for maintenance of her mills.

loans.use: To buy a motor and pay for maintenance of her mills.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cloth, perfumes, shoes, and soaps to resell

loans.name: Yovanna

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “TRES DE MAYO DE POROY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yovanna; ella tiene 28 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de animales menores como cuyes, chanchos y gallinas, ella vende en forma ambulatoria y también lleva a diferentes mercados, la socia los hace crecer y engordar y luego los vende, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de animales menores. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cuyes, chanchos y gallinas y también para comprar alimentos para los animales.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Yovanna belongs to the "Tres de Mayo de Poroy" communal bank, located in the Cusco district, which is part of Cusco province and department.  Yovanna is 28, in a  common-law relationship, and has one child.  

She alternates her daily chores with the buying and selling of smaller animals such as guinea pigs, pigs, chickens.  She sells door-to-door, and also carries on her business at different markets. She raises and fattens the animals and then sells them. By means of this business, she is helping her family get ahead in life. She wants to expand and improve her business of selling smaller animals.

She is applying for the loan in order to buy guinea pigs, pigs and chickens and also to buy feed for the animals. She is happy to receive the loan, and is committed to making her instalment payments.

loans.use: To buy guinea pigs, pigs, chickens, and animal feed.

loans.name: Unifredo

texts.es: Unifredo tiene 48 años, convive con Esterfilia de 46 años, con quien tiene 04 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Nueva fortaleza, Pichari. Apenas estudio la primaria, debido a faltas económicas, pero eso no lo impidió a seguir adelante. Es así que logró tener su propio campo agrícola, ahí siembra café y cacao, productos que tiene mucha demanda en el mercado nacional e internacional, asimismo afirma que éstos productos están bajo un sistema de cultivo órganico, eso ha hecho que su producción sea de calidad. Gracias a todo éste trabajo es que puede ahora percibir buenas ganancias. En ocasiones recibe la ayuda de su esposa e hijos, pero cuando se necesita cosechar, necesariamente debe contratar jornaleros para que realicen con mayo rápidez la extracción. Este será su primer crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en pagar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1,000 soles que solicita, contratará jornaleros para que limpien sus plantas de café y cacao.
texts.en:
Unifredo is 48, and lives with Esterfilla 46. They have four children, and live in their own house in the community of Nueva Fortaleza in Pichari district. He barely completed primary schooling due to the lack of financial resources, but that didn't stop him from moving forward. In this way, he managed to acquire his own land. 

He grows coffee and cacao, products that are are in great demand in the national and international markets.  Also, he says that these products are grown organically; which has resulted in his production being of high quality.

Thanks to all this work, he can now earn earn good profits.  Sometimes his wife and children help him, but when the crop needs to be harvested, he must necessarily hire day laborers so that the harvest can be carried out more quickly. 

This will be his first loan with MFP, so he is committed to making his instalment payments on time.  With the 1,000 soles he is applying for, he will hire day laborers to weed his coffee and cacao plants.

loans.use: To hire day laborers.

loans.name: Gabriela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “TRES DE MAYO DE POROY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gabriela; ella tiene 27 años de edad y es casada; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artesanía como chompas, pantalones, polos y muñecas, ella vende en forma ambulatoria desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de artesanía. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar chompas, polos, pantalones, muñecas y llaveros al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Tres de Mayo de Poroy Communal Bank, located in the Cusco district in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

Gabriela is 27 years old and married.  She alternates her daily activities with her business selling crafts such as sweaters, pants, jerseys, and dolls.  She sells on foot from 8 a.m. until 6 p.m.  With this business Gabriela gets her children ahead.  She wants to expand and improve her business selling crafts.

Gabriela is requesting the loan to buy wholesale sweaters, jerseys, pants, dolls, and key rings.

She is happy about the loan and is committed to making the payments.

loans.use: to buy wholesale sweaters, jerseys, pants, dolls, and key rings.

loans.name: Nataliya

texts.ru:
Наталья замужем. У нее есть дочь. Их небольшая семья проживает в городе Павлограде. Наталья имеет собственный бизнес.

Наталья продает женские пальто, куртки. Торговая точка расположена в удачном месте. Занимается Наталья этим  делом более 7 лет. Она трудолюбива. Наталья также вежлива по отношению к клиентам.  Доход ее бизнеса играет большую роль в бюджете семьи. 

Наталья просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 20,000 гривен на приобретение новых пальто и курточек к осеннему сезону.
texts.en: Natalya is married and has a daughter.  Their small family lives in the town of Pavlograd.  Natalya has her own business.  She sells women's coats and jackets. Her retail outlet is located in a successful place.  Natalya has been involved in this business for over 7 years.  She is a hard-working person.  Natalya is also polite to her customers.  The business income plays a big role in the family's budget.  Natalya is requesting a loan in the sum of 20 000 hryvnia to buy new coats and jackets for the fall season.

loans.use: to buy new coats and jackets for the fall season

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “TRES DE MAYO DE POROY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Sonia; ella tiene 36 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de salchipapas que es un plato a base de papas y salchichas, ella tiene una carreta donde vende las salchipapas, ella vende en forma ambulatoria desde las 4:00 a.m hasta las 11:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de salchipapas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar papas y salchichas al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank, "Tres de Mayo de Poroy."  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco, and department of Cusco.

The member is Sonia, she is 36 years old, cohabiting, and has 3 children.  Sonia alternates her daily activities with the her business of selling salchipapas, which is a dish of potatoes and sausages.  She has a cart where she sells the salchipapas door to door from 4:00 am until 11:00 pm.  Through this business, Sonia raises her children.  Sonia wants to expand the business of selling salchipapas so she is requesting the loan to buy potatoes and sausage in bulk.

Sonia is happy for the loan and agrees to comply with the payment of her dues.

loans.use: to buy potatoes and sausage in bulk.

loans.name: Darwin Jose

texts.es: Darwin José tiene su pulpería, desde hace mas de 6 años que tiene este negocio. La lucha constante que realiza por brindarles a sus 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo lo necesario ha proporcionado mejor estabilidad a su familia. Empieza a atender a sus clientes desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche sus clientes son amigos, vecinos y familiares que siempre le solicitan variedad en sus productos. El motivo del crédito es para la compra granos básicos, sopas, enlatados, detergentes, papel higiénico entre otros.
texts.en:
Darwin José has had a grocery store for over six years.  His constant struggle to provide his two minor children in his care with everything they need has led to improved family stability.  

He starts to tend to his customers at 7am and continues until 10pm.  His customers are his friends, neighbors and family members who always seek out the variety of his products.  The reason for the loan is to buy basic grains, soups, canned goods, detergent and toilet paper, among others.

loans.use: to buy stock items for his store.

loans.name: Susana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “TRES DE MAYO DE POROY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Susana; ella tiene 26 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de piña, ella tiene un carreta donde vende piña en rodajas, ella vende en las diferentes calles de la ciudad de Cusco desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de piñas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar piñas al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Susana, 26, is a member of the “Tres de Mayo de Poroy” communal bank that’s located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Department.

She has a spouse and a son.  She alternates her daily chores with a business selling pineapples.  She has a cart where she sells sliced pineapple in various streets in the city of Cusco from 9am until 5pm.  

She’d like to expand and improve the pineapple sales business and is asking for a loan to buy pineapples at wholesale.  She is happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy pineapples at wholesale.

loans.name: Alex

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “TRES DE MAYO DE POROY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Alex; el tiene 22 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de árboles frutales, el socio vende arboles a diferentes personas que tienen terrenos de cultivo y también vende arboles pequeños para adornos, el socio vende en forma independiente, el socio qui9ere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de arboles. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar árboles frutales y arboles pequeños.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Tres de Mayo de Poroy Communal Bank, located in the Cusco district in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

Alex is 22 years old and single.  He alternates his daily activities with his business selling fruit trees.  He sells trees to different people who have croplands, and he also sells small trees for decoration.  Alex is self-employed.  He wants to expand and improve his business selling trees.

Alex is requesting the loan to buy fruit trees and small trees.

He is happy about the loan and is committed to making the payments.

loans.use: to buy fruit trees and small trees.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE WIMPILLAY CHOCCO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Verónica; ella tiene 32 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de artesanía, ella hace trabajos en trenzado, ella hace trabajos como pulseras, collares y aretes, ella vende en forma ambulatoria desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de artesanía. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales como lanas y tejedores.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Verónica is a member of the “SEÑOR DE WIMPILLAY CHOCCO” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Verónica is 32 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her craft business.  She weaves items such as bracelets, necklaces and earrings.  She sells her products as an itinerant vendor from 8.00am to 9.00pm.  Through this work, she gets her children ahead in life.  She would like to expand her craft business.  She is requesting a loan to buy yarn and weaving supplies.

Verónica is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy yarn and weaving supplies

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es:
A la vivienda del señor Tomas le está haciendo falta los acabados del exterior e interior. 
Esta solicitando un préstamo para comprar el material que es cemento, arena y pintura especial para la vivienda, ya que en este momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario ya que el se encargara de realizar la mejora en horario adicional a su empleo.
Don Tomas planea pagar el crédito con una parte de las ganancias que obtiene de su trabajo en una fábrica en producción,  es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para su familia. Ya que su esposa la señora Estela se dedica al cuidado y atención de sus hijos.
Desea mejorar el patrimonio y  la calidad de vida de su familia y evitar enfermedades.
texts.en:
Tomas' home needs some finishing work carrying out to both the outside and the inside.  He is requesting a loan to buy material such as cement, sand and special paint for the house.  Right now, he does not have the money he needs.  He will carry out this improvement work outside of his normal work hours.

Tomas plans to repay his loan with some of the money that he makes from his job in a factory.  This is the source of income that he has for supporting his family.  His wife, Estela, takes care of their children.

Tomas would like to improve his property, improve his family's quality of life and avoid illnesses.

loans.use: to carry out some finishing work to the outside and inside of his home (paint)

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE WIMPILLAY CHOCCO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ana Cecilia; ella tiene 31 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y también tiene un negocio de peluquería, ella atiende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de peluquería. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para la tienda de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, mantequilla y leche al por mayor y para comprar materiales para la peluquería como tintes, ruleros y tijeras.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ana Cecilia is a member of the “SEÑOR DE WIMPILLAY CHOCCO” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Ana Cecilia is 31 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children.  She divides her time between her daily activities, her grocery store business and her hairdressing salon.  She serves her customers from 8.00am to 7.00pm and, through her businesses, she gets her children ahead in life.  Ana Cecilia would like to expand her grocery store business and her hairdressing business.  She is requesting this loan to buy products wholesale for her grocery store (rice, sugar, butter and milk), and to buy materials for her hairdressing salon (such as dyes, rollers and scissors).

Ana Cecilia is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy products wholesale for her grocery store (rice, sugar, butter and milk), and to buy materials for her hairdressing salon (dyes, rollers and scissors)

loans.name: Danelia De Los Angeles

texts.es: Danelia De Los Ángeles tiene 35 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 2 años que tiene este negocio, inicio por la necesidad de buscar nuevos ingresos para ella y su familia. Ella se siente contenta porque esta experiencia es muy reconfortante pues no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos. Tiene 2 hijos de 5 y 15 años respectivamente a quienes diariamente les enseña valores y trabajar arduamente. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de ropa, perfumes, cremas, lápiz labial, polvos, ropa interior, prendas de oro laminado y plata.
texts.en:
Danelia De Los Ángeles is 35 years old.  Her business is selling general merchandise.  She has been in this business for more than two years.  She started out as she needed to find new income for herself and her family.  Danelia feels happy because this experience is very comforting.  This is not the first time that she has taken out a loan.

Danelia has two children aged 5 and 15.  Every day she teaches them values and to work hard.  The purpose of this loan is to buy clothes, perfume, creams, lipsticks, powders, underwear, and gold- and silver-plated jewelry.

loans.use: to buy clothes, perfume, creams, lipsticks, powders, underwear, and gold- and silver-plated jewelry

loans.name: Ludmila

texts.ru: Людмла – вдова, мать четверых детей. Она начала свой бизнес 8 лет назад, так как не имела другой возможности содержать свою семью. Благодаря напористости и решительности, Людмила смогла развить свой бизнес, который стал небольшим, но стабильным источником дохода. Людмила просит выдать ей кредит в размере 5,000 гривен на закупку сезонного товара. Она надеется получить дополнительную прибыль и приобрести кухонный комбайн.
texts.en: Ludmila is a widow and a mother of four children.  She started her business 8 years ago because she had no other option to support her family.  Thanks to her persistence and decisiveness, Ludmila was able to develop her business, which became a small, but stable source of income.  Ludmila is requesting a loan in the sum of 5,000 hryvnia to purchase seasonal merchandise.  She hopes to make an additional profit and buy a kitchen food processor.

loans.use: to buy seasonal merchandise

loans.name: Reinaldo

texts.es: El cliente, REINALDO, tiene un hijo, es casado, son de familia humilde, el cliente se dedica a la producción de la leche cruda, actualmente cuenta con 6 cabezas de ganado lechero en producción, y 2 cabezas de ganado lechero preñadas. El destino del crédito es para comprar un tanque de enfriamiento, donde un grupo de personas están haciendo ese esfuerzo de comprar un tanque de enfriamiento, ya que la producción que sacan les queda muy lejos para ir a entregar, en ese sentido, será de mayor beneficio para el cliente y sus demás compañeros.   Actualmente el cliente vive en la localidad de Esquilan Chico que se encuentra en la Provincia de Quillacollo del Departamento de  Cochabamba.
texts.en: Our client, Reinaldo, is married and has one child.  His is a humble family.  Our client produces raw milk.  He currently has six head of dairy cattle which are producing milk and two head of dairy cattle which are pregnant.  The purpose of his loan is to buy a milk cooling tank.  A group of people are making this joint effort to buy a cooling tank as the milk their cows produce must travel a long way to be delivered.  It will be a great benefit for our client and his fellow dairy farmers.  Our client currently lives in the village of Esquilan Chico which is located in Quillacollo province, in Cochabamba department.

loans.use: to (jointly) buy a milk cooling tank

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy oil, rice, meat, chicken, cabbage, tortillas, etc.

loans.name: Eva

texts.es:
Eva integrante del Banco comunal “Los Jardines” perteneciente a la comuna de Peñalolén.
Se dedica al rubro de los servicios y comercio, ya que atiende un ciber, bazar y paquetería, desde hace tres años.
Comenta que en su local cuenta con 8 computadores, carga de celulares, tarjetas para el transporte vehicular (Transantiago), por lo que también entrega diferentes servicios. Su local está ubicado en el ante jardín de la casa de su suegra.    
Sus productos los compra directamente en las distribuidoras y a los proveedores, ya que necesita insumos como CD, para fotos y música. 
Con el crédito comprará una maquina fotocopiadora, ya que tenía una en mal estado.
Sus metas son ampliar su local o arrendar uno más grande, para acrecentarlo con mas computadores, espera contar con 15 PC. 
Eva vive junto a su marido y sus dos hijos de 11 y 7 años de edad. Sus sueños en el ámbito personal son recorrer el país en un viaje.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de los servicios brindados por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le ha dado la oportunidad de invertir en su negocio y crecer como persona.
El grupo del Banco comunal al cual pertenece, es unido, solidario y responsable. Respecto a las capacitaciones, ha aprendido de contabilidad para administrar mejor su negocio. 
Peñalolén se localiza al oriente de la región metropolitana. Cuenta con diversos atractivos tales como viñas, edificios considerados patrimonio histórico y sitios naturales de excursión, elementos que están transformando a esta comuna en un nuevo panorama turístico dentro de la región Metropolitana.
texts.en:
Eva is a member of the “Los Jardines” (The Gardens) communal bank belonging to Peñalolén commune.  She provides services and is a merchant.  She runs an Internet café, variety store and packaging service; she’s been in business for three years.

She comments that in her location she has 8 computers, she sells cell phone recharge time, vehicle transportation cards (Transantiago) and she also provides other services.  Her store is located in the front yard of her mother-in-law’s house.

She buys her products directly from distributors and suppliers since she needs supplies like CDs for photos and for music.

She will use the loan to buy a photocopier since the one she had was in pretty bad shape.  Her goals are to expand her locale or rent a bigger one to add more computers; she hopes to have 15 PCs.

She lives with her husband and two children who are 11 and 7 years old.  Her dream on a personal level is to take a trip around her country.

She is very happy with and grateful for the services provided by Fondo Esperanza because it’s provided her with the opportunity to invest in her business and to grow as a person.

The group of the communal bank she’s a member of is very united, mutually supportive and responsible.  With respect to the training, she’s learned bookkeeping to better manage her business.

Peñalolén is located to the east of the metropolitan region.  It has several attractions like vineyards, buildings considered to be national relics and natural exploration areas, elements that are turning this commune into a new tourism destination within the metropolitan region.

loans.use: to buy a photocopier.

loans.name: Alla

texts.en:
Alla is married with four children. She rents a space at the central department store in her small city and sells children’s clothing. Her profit is 3,400 UAH per month.

Alla has been in this business for 15 years. During this time she has been able to win many repeat customers. She enjoys selling children's clothing and helps the parents to choose good clothing for their children. 

Alla would like to borrow 15,000 UAH to increase the assortment of her inventory. She hopes to receive additional income and spend it on her family needs.

loans.use: to increase the assortment of her inventory.

loans.name: Yana

texts.ru:
Яна жизнерадостный и активный человек. Она замужем и у них с Вадимом семилетний сын. Яна имеет свой бизнес.

На центральном рынке города  Яна торгует джинсами, юбками и сарафанами. Она всегда доброжелательна к клиентам, поэтому ее бизнес процветает.  За два года она достигла неплохих результатов, но не собирается останавливаться.  Яна верит, что большой ассортимент и приемлемые цены помогут ей увеличить доход. Этот бизнес содержит семью.

Яна просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 20,000 гривен для расширения ассортимента осеннего товара. НА полученную прибыль планирует улучшить жилищные условия.
texts.en: Yana is a buoyant and active person.  She is married and, with husband Vadim, has a seven-year-old son.  Yana has her own business.  She sells jeans, skirts and dresses at the city central market.  She is always kind to her customers, and this is why her business is flourishing.  She achieved good results in two years and does not plan to stop there.  Yana believes that extensive selection and reasonable prices will help her increase her income.  This business supports the family.  Yana is requesting a loan in the sum of 20,000 hryvnia to expand the selection of her fall merchandise.  She plans to use the resulting profit to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to expand her selection of fall merchandise

loans.name: Las Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
Las Trabajadoras se denomina el grupo D. mujeres conformado en la ciudad D. Ita, gracias a que la actual Directora General la Señora Verónica, contactó con la asesora para informarse D. la forma D. trabajo que tiene el Comité D. Mujeres Emprendedoras, una vez asesorada acerca del Programa logró juntar a 14 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto en el segundo ciclo, en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro sel programa. Todas ellas realizan actividades para recaudar fondos, se ayudan mutuamente para llegar a los objetivos en común.
La señora Verónica es una D. las miembros, ella se dedica a la venta D. gallinas, comenta que tiene muchos pedidos D. esto. Gracias a su trabajo ella ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia y cubrir los gastos diarios D. la casa. Está muy orgullosa D. lo que hace, por lo que quiere seguir con el negocio.
Solicita el crédito para la compra D. gallinas y alimentos para estas. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le da.
texts.en:
“Las Trabajadoras” (The Women Workers) is the name of a group of women that was established in the city of Ita, thanks to the efforts of the current Director General, Sra. Verónica. She contacted a program consultant to obtain information about the requirements for participating in the Committee of Women Entrepreneurs Program. Once she was advised about the program, she was able to gather 14 women who are now working comfortably together in their second loan cycle. They have worked in a cooperative and unified manner as part of the program. All of them participate in fundraising activities, thereby helping one another reach their common objectives.

Sra. Verónica is one of the members who sells chickens. She says that she gets many requests for her animals. Thanks to her work, she has been able to move her family forward and cover the daily household expenses. Verónica is very proud of what she has accomplished and wants to continue with her business. She is requesting a loan to buy chickens and feed for them. Verónica is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya for the opportunity that has been given to her.

loans.use: to buy chickens and poultry feed.

loans.name: Anibal

texts.es:
El señor Anibal es de la ciudad de Santaní, tiene 47 años de edad, está casado con la Señora Isidora con 43 años de edad. Tienen 4 Hijos, todos mayores de edad, trabajan independientes.
Posee una Despensa en su domicilio particular, lo cual, según el comenta es el sustento de su familia. En cuanto a su clientela dice que diariamente muchas personas se acercan hasta su negocio, pues el les brinda una buena atención y así también buenos precios. El se define como un señor muy trabajador, luchador y pos obre todo muy emprendedor.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de bebidas, comestibles, lácteos y otros productos de primera necesidad, los cuales son indispensables para su negocio. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le da.
texts.en:
Mr. Anibal is from the city of Santaní. He is 47 years old and is married to Ms. Isidora, 43. They have 4 children; all are grown and work independently. 

He has a grocery store in his home that he says is the means of support for his family. As for his clientele, he says that every day many people come by his store. He attends to them diligently and sets good prices. He defines himself as a hardworking man, a fighter, and above all, very enterprising.

He is requesting the loan to purchase drinks, foods, dairy products, and other basic necessities that are essential to his business. He thanks the foundation for the opportunity that the loan provides him

loans.use: purchase drinks, foods, dairy products, and other basic necessities.

loans.name: Marta

texts.es:
La Señora Marta tiene 52 años D. edad, está casada y tiene con 4 hijos, es D. la ciudad D. Paraguarí, desD. hace más D. 15 años vive en casa propia con su marido el Señor Angel.
Marta se dedica a la venta D. chipa desD. hace más D. 2 años con su marido y dos hijas que también empezaron a  trabajar en el mismo ramo ya que con el obtienen muy buen ingreso mensual aparte D. que tienen una clientela  y zona D. venta formada.
Ella comenta que su negocio le genera muy buenos ingresos ya que la chipa, en Paraguay, es muy consumida por todos. Dice que es un negocio con el cual le gustaría poder seguir e ir creciendo más y más cada día.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. materia prima, como ser almidón, manteca, harina, huevo, queso y otros para la elaboración D. la chipa.
texts.en:
Marta, 52, is married with four children.  She's from the city of Paraguarí and has lived in her own house with her husband Angel for more than 15 years.

Marta has been selling "chipa" [cheese rolls] for more than two years with her husband and two daughters, who also began to work in the same field since they receive a very good monthly income as well as having customers and an established sales area.

Marta says that her business generates very good earnings for her since everyone in Paraguay eats "chipa."  She would like to be able to continue with the business and grow with it more and more every day.

She is requesting the loan to buy manioc starch, lard, flour, eggs, cheese, and other ingredients to make "chipa."

loans.use: to buy manioc starch, lard, flour, eggs, cheese, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Ruth Damaris

texts.es:
La señora Ruth tiene 32 años de edad. Vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 7 y 2 años de edad.

Ella se dedica a la crianza de ganado bovino (vacas) y porcino (cerdos) con la ayuda de su compañero de vida. Tienen más de dos años de realizar esta actividad juntos. La señora Ruth aprendió este trabajo gracias a su mamá, pues ella desempeñaba esta actividad. Por falta de recursos, la señora Ruth tuvo que abandonar sus estudios universitarios en su tercer año de psicología. Debido a esto se dedicó a la crianza de ganado para tener una fuente de ingresos.

Ella compra el ganado en los alrededores de la comunidad donde vive. Cuando una persona le avisa que tiene ganado para la venta, ella va y lo negocia, si le parece lo compra. Una vez comprado, ella tiene que llevarlo a su casa a pie por la calle. Cuando adquiere el ganado en la ciudad ella camina unos cinco kilómetros desde el lugar en donde lo compra hasta su casa.

La señora Ruth solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo para la compra de ganado de crianza. Si compra  novillas, ella comprará tres; pero si decide comprar vacas lecheras comprará solo una, ya que estas tienen un precio más alto que las novillas. Con el préstamo ella pretende aumentar la producción de leche y de esta manera poderla procesar y así vender productos lácteos. Ella ha visto la oportunidad de tener buenos ingresos, ya que hay personas que buscan los productos lácteos en su casa y ella aún no los tiene disponibles. 

A la señora Ruth tiene planes a futuro, según sea la producción y crianza del ganado, de hacerle mejoras a su vivienda. Ella quiere repellar las paredes, mejorar el corredor y el techo, ya que en invierno tiene varias goteras.
texts.en:
Ruth, 32, lives with her husband and their two children, ages 7 and 2.

She raises cows and pigs with the help of her life partner.  They have been doing this work together for more than two years.  Ruth learned this work thanks to her mother, since she always did this work.  Ruth had to abandon her university studies in her third year of studying psychology because of lack of resources.  Because of this she started raising livestock, to have a source of income.

She buys the livestock on the outskirts of the community where she lives.  When someone tells her they have livestock for sale, she goes and negotiates for it; she buys it if it seems good to her.  Once bought, she has to take it to her house on foot through the street.  When she acquires the animal in the city, she walks some five kilometers from the place she buys it to her house.

Ruth is requesting a loan from the Campo Foundation to buy livestock to raise.  If she buys heifers, she will buy three; but if she decides to buy dairy cows, she will buy only one, since they are more expensive than heifers.  With the loan she is trying to to increase the milk production and in this way be able to process it to sell dairy products.  She has seen the opportunity to have good income, since people are already looking for dairy products at her house and she doesn't have them available yet.

Ruth's plan for the future is to make improvements to her house, depending on the production and raising of her livestock.  She wants to plaster the walls and improve the porch and the roof, since there are various leaks in the winter.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Anatilia Josefa

texts.es: Anatila Josefa tiene su negocio es que es una pulpería. Ella se encuentra muy contenta con su medio de vida. La dedicación que tiene con su negocio es algo que con las ganancias observa que ha valido la pena el esforzarse diariamente. Es en su vivienda donde está ubicado su negocio y llegan sus diferentes clientes a comprar los víveres necesarios como granos básicos, detergentes, refrescos, pan, galletas, entre otros.
texts.en: Anatila Josefa’s business is a grocery store.  She is very happy with her way of life.  The dedication she has toward her business is something that has borne fruit with profits earned and she notes that it’s well worth the daily effort.  Her store is located in her home and various customers come by to purchase needed foodstuffs like basic grains, detergents, soft-drinks, bread and cookies, among others.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Vladislav

texts.ru:
Владислав имеет довольно большой бизнес - три торговые точки. Он хочет закупить сезонный товар (мужскую одежду на осень и зиму) на большую сумму, потому что это выгодно - делаются хорошие скидки. Владислав планирует расширяться, арендовать точку в универмаге. 

Владислав пользуется кредитами не первый раз.Он никогда не опаздывает с выплатами, хотя приходится приезжать из соседнего города - Энергодара. За счет полученной прибыли они с женой сделали хороший ремонт в квартире. Несмотря на свой возраст (46 лет) у них в семье недавно родился ребенок - сын.
texts.en:
Vladislav has a fairly large business with three sales locations. He wants to purchase seasonal merchandise (mens clothing for autumn and winter) for a large amount because this way it's more profitable - he gets good discounts. Vladislar plans to expand, rent out space in a mall.

Vladislav is not taking out the loan for the first time. He was never late with payments even though he has to come from another town of Energodar. He and his wife used the earned profit to make good remodeling in their apartment. Despite his age (46 years old) a son was born recently in his family.

loans.use: to buy mens clothing for autumn and winter

loans.name: Ramona Antonia

texts.es: Ramona Antonia se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, desde hace mas de 9 años, ella tiene 2 hijos de los cuales solamente el de 17 años está bajo su cargo. La forma en cómo distribuye sus productos es de manera ambulante pues la mayoría de sus clientes saben que siempre está brindando la mejor atención a sus clientes pues además la amplia experiencia que ha obtenido por estos años ha sido la mejor. Es por eso que solicita el financiamiento para la compra de perfumes, cremas, desodorantes, colonias, bodys, talcos, entre otros.
texts.en: Ramona Antonia has been selling cosmetics for over nine years.  She has two children but only the 17-year-old is still in her care.  She sells her wares door to door because most of her customers know that she always provides the best customer service because the vast experience she’s gained over these years has been the best.  Because of this, she’s asking for a loan to buy perfume, cream, deodorant, cologne, body wash and talc, among others.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.es:
La señora Veronica tiene ya más de diez años con su negocio de elaboración y venta de comida que son (hamburguesas, chiles rellenos, tacos y tortas). 
Solicita un préstamo para invertir en su negocio en comprar material que es (carnes, verduras, tortillas y pan, también necesita comprar platos, vasos) no cuenta con el dinero necesario para realizar la inversión ya que tiene un contrato en una compañía para que les entrega platillos de comida todos los días y no quiere desaprovechar esta oportunidad que se le esta presentando para que su negocio tenga un ingreso mas fijo. 
 Doña Veronica es madre soltera y tiene bajo su responsabilidad un hijo que esta estudiando y quiere que tenga los estudia necesario para su futuro. 
Planea pagar el crédito con una parte de las ganancias que obtiene de su negocio y que es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para su familia.
texts.en:
Verónica has had her food preparation and sales business for over ten years.  She makes hamburgers, stuffed chili peppers, tacos and tortas [Mexican sandwiches].

She is asking for a loan to invest in her business buying supplies like meats, vegetables, tortillas and bread; she also needs to buy dishes and glasses.  She does not have the necessary funds to make this investment.  She has a contract with a firm to deliver meals to them daily and she doesn’t want to waste this opportunity for her business to have a more steady income.

Verónica is a single mother with a son in her care who is in school and she wants him to have the necessary schooling for his future.  She plans to repay the loan with profits earned in her business which is her family’s source of income.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and supplies for her meal preparation.

loans.name: Flor

texts.es: Flor tiene 36 años, es una mujer dinámica, emprendedora y muy trabajadora; convive con su pareja, con quien tiene tres hijos de 15, 13 y 1 año y medio. Juntos habitan en su casa propia  comparten los días educando e intentando brindarle s una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. Ella se dedica a diversas actividades, pues posee un restaurante ofreciendo desayunos y jugos por las mañanas, al medio día expende comida, y por las noches ofrece pollo broaster. Asimismo posee un terreno, a 60 km de su vivienda, en ella siembra productos como el cacao y frutas cítricas, a la vez que cría aves de corral. Su esposo es quien más la apoya en el trabajo, al igual que sus hijos. Pero el trabajo que más la apasiona es la de cocinar y eso se demuestra en la buena sazón que tiene, y eso le ha dado mucha ventaja en su negocio, pues son muchos los clientes que recurren a su establecimiento.  Este será el tercer crédito con MFP, y por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para continuar con su trabajo. Con el monto solicitado, comprará pollitos para criarlos para luego convertirlo en materia prima para la preparación de sus alimentos.
texts.en:
Flor is 36 years old.  She is a dynamic, entrepreneurial and very hard-working woman who lives with her partner.  The couple have three children aged 15, 13 and 18 months.  They live together in their own home and spend their days educating their children and trying to provide them with a better quality of life.

Flor is engaged in a number of different business activities.  She owns a restaurant where she sells breakfasts and juices in the mornings.  At midday she sells meals and, in the evenings, she sells fried chicken.  She also owns a plot of land, 60km from her home, where she grows products such as cacao and citrus fruits.  In addition, she raises poultry.  Her husband is the one who supports her the most in her work but her children help too.  The work that she is most passionate about is the cooking and this shows in the great flavor that her food has.  This gives her a great advantage in her business as she has many customers who come to her establishment.

This will be Flor's third loan from MFP and she hopes to receive your support so that she can continue in her work.  She will use the sum she has requested to buy chicks to raise and then turn into ingredients for making her food.

loans.use: to buy chicks

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
17 mujeres D. la ciudad D. Asunción se unieron con el propósito D. obtener mayores beneficios para su familia por medio del trabajo en conjunto D. las mismas. Actualmente ellas se encuentran en el décimo ciclo del programa D. mujeres emprendedoras D. la Fundación Paraguaya. Ellas son mujeres muy trabajadoras, luchadoras y por sobre todo muy comprometidas.
La Miryam es una D. las miembros, ella se dedica a la venta D. muebles. Este negocio la ayuda con la manutención D. la casa, como así también D. los otros gastos que surgen día a día. Comenta que tiene buenas ventas ya que sus muebles son D. muy buena calidad. Desea poder seguir con el negocio y D. esa forma seguir manteniendo a su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. algunos muebles para abastecer su negocio. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le brinda, pues D. obtener el crédito le será D. gran ayuda.
texts.en:
Seventeen women from the city of Asunción joined together with the aim of obtaining more money for their families by working together.  They are currently in their tenth loan cycle as part of the 'Mujeres Emprendedoras' (Entrepreneurial Women) program run by Fundación Paraguaya.  They are very hard-working, tenacious and, above all, very committed.

Miryam is one of the members of this group.  Her business is selling furniture.  This business helps her to support her household and to cover other expenses that come up on a day-to-day basis.  She tells us that she makes good sales as the furniture she sells is very good quality.  She would like to be able to continue in her business and thereby continue supporting her family.

Miryam is requesting this loan to buy some pieces of furniture with which to stock her business.  She is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya for the opportunity that they are giving her as this loan will be a great help to her.

loans.use: to buy furniture to sell

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
La Sra. Martha vive en la comunidad conocida como Esquilan Chico, en la provincia de Quillacollo en el departamento de Cochabamba, junto a sus padres, los cuales son mayores de edad y ella los cuida. La Sra Martha se dedica a la producción de leche cruda y su posterior venta a la empresa Pil Andina. Actualmente cuenta con 12 cabezas de ganado lechero en producción y obtiene de las mismas un aproximado de 95 litros diarios.
El siguiente crédito que solicita es para la compra de un tanque de leche enfriamiento (el tanque de enfriamiento es un deposito para mantener la leche cruda en buen estado, es de este tanque de donde recoge la Empresa Pil la leche todas las mañanas y todas las tardes) el cual en primer lugar tiene un costo aproximado de 13.000$us a 16.000$us, es por esta razón que la compra la están haciendo conjunta con otras 15 personas de la misma comunidad poniendo 1000$us cada uno. La Sra Martha Al tener el tanque de Enfriamiento más cerca de su casa podrá realizar su trabajo en menos tiempo y poder pasar más tiempo con sus padres.
texts.en:
Martha lives in a community known as “Esquilan Chico” in Quillacollo Province, Cochabamba Department with her elderly parents that she cares for.  Martha is a raw milk dairy farmer.  The milk is sold to the Pil Andina firm.  She currently has 12 head of dairy cattle producing and she gets about 95 liters daily from them.

The loan she’s asking for is to buy a milk cooling tank (The cooling tank is a storage unit to keep raw milk in good condition.  This is the tank that the Pil firm collects the milk from every morning and afternoon).  

Its price is between US$13,000 to US$16,000 and this is why the purchase is being made together with 15 other people from the same community; each one is putting in US$1,000.  By having a cooling tank closer to home, Martha will be able to do her work in less time and be able to spend more time with her parents.

loans.use: to buy a share in a raw milk cooling tank.

loans.name: Lesya

texts.ru:
Леся замужем. Ее супруга зовут Вадим. У них с мужем взрослый сын. Леся имеет собственный бизнес.
Леся продает женскую обувь. Она грамотно подбирает ассортимент, и практически каждая покупательница может найти то, что ищет.  Леся прилежна и трудолюбива.  Для нее важно получение стабильной прибыли.  Доход этого бизнеса идет на содержание семьи. Леся просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 20000 гривен для пополнения ассортимента к осеннему и зимнему сезону.
texts.en: Lesya is married. Her husband's name is Vadim. Together they have a grown son. Lesya has her own business, she sells women's shoes. She selects the merchandise correctly and almost every customer can find what she is looking for. Lesya is diligent and hardworking. A stable profit is very important to her. The income from this business goes towards supporting the family. Lesya is asking to provide her with a loan in the amount of 20,000 hrivna to fulfill the assortment for the autumn and winter season.

loans.use: to fulfill the assortment for the autumn and winter season

loans.name: Juana Lissette

texts.es: Juana Lissette se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más 2 años que tiene este medio de vida. Ella es una mujer responsable, junto a sus dos hijos menores de edad que están bajo su cargo es una madre que siempre está pendiente de lo necesario para sus hijos. Ella solicita este crédito para la compra de cosméticos, bolsos, ropa en general, calzado entre otros. El obtener este financiamiento le será beneficioso para lograr variedad en lo que ofrezca a sus clientes.
texts.en: Juana Lissette sells general merchandise. She has been doing this for more than two years. She is a responsible woman. Her two minor children are in her care, and she is a mother who is always looking out for her children's needs. She is asking for this loan to purchase cosmetics, bags, general clothing, and shoes, among other items.  Obtaining this loan will help her achieve variety in the products she offers her customers.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics, bags, general clothing, and shoes, among other items

loans.name: Angel

texts.es:
El Sr. Angel vive en la comunidad conocida como Esquilan Chico en la privincia de Quillacollo en el departamento de Cochabamba, Angel es una persona muy trabajadora. No está casado ni tiene hijos y solo termino colegio hasta primaria desde entonces se dedica al 100 % al cuidado de su ganado lechero.  Angel se dedica a la producción de leche cruda y su posterior venta a la empresa Pil Andina y también se dedica a la elaboración de quesillo y su posterior venta en el mercado de Colcapirhua. Actualmente cuenta con 9 cabezas de ganado lechero en producción y obtiene de las mismas un aproximado de 90 litros diarios.
El siguiente crédito que solicita es para la compra de un tanque de leche enfriamiento (el tanque de enfriamiento es un deposito de leche cruda que se mantiene en buen estado, es de este tanque de donde recoge la Empresa Pil la leche todas las mañanas y todas las tardes) el cual en primer lugar tiene un costo aproximado de 13.000$us a 16.000$us, es por esta razón que la compra la están haciendo conjunta con otras 15 personas de la misma comunidad poniendo 1000$us cada uno. Angel al tener el tanque de enfriamiento cerca de casa podrá colocar más leche en el mismo y tal vez dejar de vender quesillo el cual le toma mucho tiempo.
texts.en:
Ángel lives in a community known as “Esquilan Chico” in Quillacollo Province, Cochabamba Department.  Ángel is a very hardworking man.  He’s not married and has no children. He only completed elementary school and since then has been 100% dedicated to work caring for his dairy cattle.   Ángel is a raw milk dairy farmer.  The milk is sold to the Pil Andina firm.  He also makes cheese that he then sells at the Colcapirhua market.   He currently has nine head of dairy cattle that he gets about 90 liters of daily production from.

The loan he’s asking for is to buy a milk cooling tank (The cooling tank is a storage unit to keep raw milk in good condition.  This is the tank that the Pil firm collects the milk from every morning and afternoon).  Its price is between US$13,000 to US$16,000 and this is why the purchase is being made together with 15 other people from the same community; each one is putting in US$1,000.  By having a cooling tank closer to home, Ángel will be able to store more of his milk in it and perhaps be able to stop selling cheese which takes up a lot of his time.

loans.use: to pay his share in a milk cooling tank.

loans.name: David Ulises

texts.es:
El Señor David es casado, tiene 29 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Pilar, tiene casa propia, donde posee las condiciones básicas para desarrollar sus actividades dentro del seno familiar y movilidad propia para hacerlo, consistente en una moto.
Él se dedica a la venta de ropas, vaqueros y otro tipo de prendas. Desarrolla esta actividad hace como 2 años, posee la infraestructura necesaria para el desarrollo de esta actividad y su local es muy reconocido en la vecindad.
Solicita el crédito para invertir en la compra vaqueros, remeras, camisas y otros. Agradece a la Fundación Paraguaya por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
David is 29 years old and married.  He lives in the city of Pilar.  He has his own house, where he has the basic conditions to develop his business activities within the family.  He has his own transportation, a motorcycle, to do so.

He sells outfits, jeans, and other types of clothing.  He has been doing this for two years.  He has the necessary infrastructure for the development of this business activity.  His place is very well-known in the neighborhood.

He is requesting the loan to buy jeans, t-shirts, shirts, and other garments.  He is grateful to the Fundación Paraguaya for the support they have provided.

loans.use: to buy jeans, t-shirts, shirts, and other garments to later sell.

loans.name: Norma Del Carmen

texts.es: Norma Del Carmen se dedica a una pulpería. Es una mujer trabajadora y lo ha demostrado por medio de sus negocios que ha sabido manejarlos muy bien. Con fondos propios fue que ella estableció este medio de vida. Uno de sus mayores desafíos ha sido el tiempo, pues ella tiene que estar al pendiente de su negocio, por lo que no es fácil ya que es algo agotador. Este crédito que solicita es para la compra de golosinas, refrescos, pan, detergentes, granos básicos entre otros.
texts.en: Norma Del Carmen runs a grocery store.  She is a hard-working woman and she has demonstrated this through her business which she has known how to run very well.  She set up her business with her own funds.  One of her biggest challenges has been time as she has to devote herself to her business.  This is not easy as it is fairly exhausting.  She is requesting this loan to buy candies, soft drinks, bread, detergents, basic grains and other products.

loans.use: to buy candies, soft drinks, bread, detergents, basic grains, etc.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es:
La señora Nilda tiene 39 años de edad, es madre de 2 hijos, una niña de 10 años y otro de 15 años. Su cónyuge le ayuda siempre en todo lo referente a sus negocios.
Ella se dedica al comercio. Empezó el negocio realizando ventas de comestibles como empanadas, milanesas, luego de a poco fue cargando, vendiendo productos de consumo familiar como fideos, azúcar, harina, aceite. Ella comenta que su despensa tiene buenos ingresos ya que tiene una clientela bien determinada que siempre acuden a su negocio. Por medio de esto, y con la ayuda de su marido pueden mantener a sus hijos y también a la casa.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de artículos de primera necesidad como ser fideos, galletas, arroz, aceite, azúcar, carne  y otros para abastecer su local y de esa forma cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
Nilda is 39 years old and has two children, a 10 year old daughter and a 15 year old.  Her husband always helps her with everything in regards to her businesses.

She is a merchant.  She started the business by selling food like empanadas and  'milanesas' (a breaded meat dish).  After a little while she was stocking up and selling household consumer products such as noodles, sugar, flour, and oil.  She says that her grocery store has good earnings because she has well-established customers who always frequent her business.   With her customers and her husband’s help they able able to support their children and maintain their house.

She is requesting the loan to buy basic needs items like noodles, cookies, rice, oil, sugar, meat, and other items in order to stock her place and meet her customers’ needs.

loans.use: to buy basic needs items like noodles, cookies, rice, oil, sugar, meat, and other items.

loans.name: Dan

texts.es: Dan tiene 42 años, convive con pareja, con quien tiene un hijo de 4 meses. Juntos habitan en casa de su madre, en compañía de ella y de sus dos sobrinos. Su prioridad es dar educación y alimentación a sus hijos. Su trabajo consiste en la reparación de vehículos motorizados, para ello cuenta con un pequeño taller que ha montado en casa de su madre. Es así que los moto taxis de la zona recurren a su servicio, pues lo consideran como un buen mecánico, ya que los tres años de continuo trabajo lo han dado la experiencia suficiente para dar solución a las fallas mécanicas de dichos vehículos. Él trabaja solo, pero hay ocasiones que tiene mucho trabajo, por lo que se verá obligado a contratar un asistente. Espera con el tiempo ampliar su taller, pues desea arreglar también  furgonetas. Este será el tercer crédito con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para concretar sus objetivos. Con el monto solicitado, comprará herramientas y materiales para implementar su taller, entre ellas un taladro y repuestos.
texts.en:
Dan is 42 years old, lives with his partner, and has a 4-month-old son.  They live in his mother's home together with his mother and his two nephews.  Dan's priority is to educate and feed his child.  His work is repairing motor vehicles and he has a small repair shop that he set up at his mother's home.  The motorcycle taxi drivers in this area use his services as they consider him to be a good mechanic.  The three years that he has worked in this job have given him enough experience to provide a solution to the mechanical faults experienced by these vehicles.  Dan works alone but there are occasions when he has a lot of work and so he will need to hire an assistant.  He hopes, over time, to expand his repair shop as he would also like to repair vans.

This will be Dan's third loan from MFP and he hopes to receive your support in reaching his goals.  He will use the sum he has requested to buy tools and materials to equip his repair shop, including a drill and some spare parts.

loans.use: to buy a drill and some spare parts

loans.name: Mery Iralda

texts.es:
Mery Iralda tiene 41 años de edad es soltera tiene dos hijos, vive con los hijos de dieciocho, diez años de edad en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

 La VRC Unión y Progreso la Colombia baja, esta conformada por quince integrantes y está ubicada a 90 minutos de la cooperativa esta ventanilla se dedica a Actividades Agrícolas, siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz, Soya plátano, naranja, etc. 


Mery  se dedica a la agricultura, tiene dos hectáreas de terreno ahí siembra cacao, arroz, maíz, soya, plátano  las compras y las ventas lo realiza en San José del Tambo cada fin de semana, tambien se dedica a la crianza de pollos.

 Solicita el crédito para poder comprar más terreno, semillas, abonos e insumos para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos para lo posterior venderlos. 

Con el préstamo le ayudará a suplir necesidades económicas, Enfrentar desafíos que son muy frecuentes como la competencia y las plagas. 
El sueño es poderse comprar una casa y más terreno para sembrar más de lo normal para producir y aumentar los ingresos.
. . 
En los tiempos libres le gusta salir de paseo con los hijos al río para poderse refrescar.
texts.en:
Mery Iralda is 41 years old, single, and has two children.  She lives with her children, aged 18 and 10, in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.

The 'Unión y Progreso la Colombia Baja' community bank has fifteen members and is located 90 minutes from our cooperative.  The members of this community bank work in farming, growing cacao, rice, corn, soy, bananas, oranges, etc.

Mery is a farmer.  She has two hectares of land where she sows cacao, rice, corn, soy and bananas.  She makes her purchases and sales in San José del Tambo every weekend.  she also raises chickens.

Mery is requesting this loan to buy more land, seeds, manure and supplies to keep her crops in good condition so that she can sell them later.

This loan will help Mery to financially cover her needs.  She faces very frequent challenges in the form of competition and pests.  Her dream is to buy a house and more land so that she can sow and produce more than she does now and increase her income.

In her free time, Mery enjoys going out for walks by the river with her children so that they can cool themselves down.

loans.use: to buy more land, seeds, manure and supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase uniforms for employees and for marketing costs

loans.name: Narcisa De Jesus

texts.es:
Narcisa de Jesus tiene 37 años de edad es soltera vive con los padres no tiene hijos, vive en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

 La VRC Unión y Progreso la Colombia baja, esta conformada por quince integrantes y está ubicada a 90 minutos de la cooperativa esta ventanilla se dedica a Actividades Agrícolas, siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz, Soya plátano, naranja, etc. 

Narcisa se dedica a la agricultura siembra cacao, arroz, maíz, soya, plátano  las compras y las ventas lo realiza en San José del Tambo cada fin de semana.

 Solicita el crédito para poder comprar semillas, abonos fertilizantes, urea, insumos y líquidos para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos para lo posterior venderlos. 

Con el préstamo le ayudará a suplir necesidades económicas, Enfrentar desafíos que son muy frecuentes como la competencia y las plagas. 

El sueño es comprarse una casa y un terreno más para sembrar y aumentar los ingresos.

En los tiempos libres le gusta salir de paseo con los padres.
texts.en:
Narcisa de Jesus is 37 years old, single, and lives with her parents.  She does not have any children.  She lives in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.

The 'Unión y Progreso la Colombia Baja' community bank has fifteen members and is located 90 minutes from our cooperative.  The members of this bank work in farming, growing cacao, rice, corn, soy, bananas, oranges, etc.

Narcisa is a farmer who grows cacao, rice, corn, soy and bananas.  She makes her purchases and sales in San José del Tambo every weekend.

Narcisa is requesting this loan to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, urea, supplies and liquids to keep her crops in good condition for when she sells them later.   

This loan will help Narcisa to financially cover her needs.  She faces very frequent challenges in the form of competition and pests.

Narcisa's dream is to buy a house and a further plot of land so that she can sow more and increase her income.

In her free time, Narcisa enjoys going out for walks with her parents.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, urea, supplies and liquids

loans.name: Iris

texts.es: Iris tiene 25 años, es una mujer alegre y emprendedora, convive con su pareja y su hijo de apenas nueve meses. Juntos haboitan en casa de su madre, en compañía de ella y de su hermano menor de siete años. Ella es consultora de belleza, además vende cosméticos, pues su profesión es de ser cosmetóloga. En así que trabaja en su pequeño salon de belleza, negocio que ha montado en los espacios de casa. Ahí llegan amigas, vecinos, familiares y público en general, para que les haga el servicio de corte de cabello, tratamiento facial y maquillaje. Tiene tres años ejerciendo esta actividad y hasta la fecha siempre lo ha hecho sola. Su mator anhelo es tener un local propio para su salon de belleza y que este implementada de la mejor tecnología. Este será el tercer crédito con MFP, por lo que espera seguir contando con su ayuda, además agreadece los préstamos anteriores ya que le ayudo a desarrollar su negocio de a poco. Con el monto solicitado, comprará materiales para implementar su salon de belleza, además de refaccionar su local y sus muebles.
texts.en:
Iris is 25 years old.  She is a cheerful and entrepreneurial woman who lives with her partner and her son who is just nine months old.  They live in her mother's house together with her mother and her younger brother who is 7 years old.

Iris is a beauty consultant.  She also sells cosmetics.  She is a cosmetologist by profession.  She works in her small beauty salon which she set up in her house.  Her friends, neighbors, family members and members of the general public come there for her to cut their hair, provide them with a facial and do their make-up.  She has been in this business for three years and, up to now, she has worked alone.  Her greatest wish is to own her own premises for her beauty salon and for them to be equipped with the very best technology.

This will be Iris' third loan from MFP and she hopes to continue receiving your help.  She is grateful for her previous loans as they helped her to develop her business.  Iris will use the sum she has requested to buy materials to equip her beauty salon.  She will also refurbish her premises and furniture.

loans.use: to buy materials to equip her beauty salon, and to refurbish her premises and furniture

loans.name: Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
El comité Trabajadoras nace mediante la gestión y el apoyo de otro comité que se encontraba trabajando en dicho lugar. Este comité es de la Ciudad de San Lorenzo, las integrantes del comité fijaron como objetivo principal el crecimiento de cada una de ellas. Las mismas son reconocidas en el lugar como mujeres muy trabajadoras.
La Señora Martina, presidenta del grupo, está casada, con 3 hijos. Ella es una mujer muy emprendedora e innovadora. Ella tiene un negocio, se dedica a la venta de prendas de todo tipo, gracias a este negocio ella ha podido mantener a us familia y todos a quienes de ella dependen.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas, como ser remeras, camisas, pantalones y demás para la posterior venta. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le brinda.
texts.en:
The “Trabajadoras” (Hard -Working Women) communal bank was born through the effort and support of another communal bank that was working in their location.  This communal bank is in the city of San Lorenzo.  The members of the group established their primary objective to be the growth of each one of them.  They are well-known in their area as very hard-working women.

Martina, the president of the group, is married and has three children.  She is a very enterprising and innovative woman.  She has a business selling all types of clothes.  Thanks to this business she has been able to support her family and everyone who depends on her.

She is requesting the loan to buy clothes like t-shirts, shirts, pants, and others to later sell.  She is grateful to the Fundación for the opportunity they are offering her.

loans.use: to buy clothes like t-shirts, shirts, pants, and others to later sell.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es: La Sra. Cristina tiene 3 hijos, es conviviente y tiene 41 años D. edad  actualmente es integrante en la alcancía comunal “Mujeres Emprendedoras” grupo  conformado por 5  socios que se dedican a diversas actividades D. comercio.  Cristina  trabaja desD. hace 10  años en la venta D. plástico gas y carbón , trabaja en el mercado D. su distrito este trabajo surge por que a su esposo no le alcanzaba el sueldo para mantener a sus tres hijos y es asi que cristina pone su negocio D. vender plasticos con el tiempo se hizo D. un capital y compro carbon y gas para vender cristina trabajo muy duro junto a su esposo,hoy en dia tienen clientes fidelizados y el negocio sigue creciendo, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a logrado mejores ingresos económicos, , poco apoco fue comprando cosas para su hogar, sus hijos tienen educacion privada  y sobre todo su familia cuenta con una mejor calidad D. vida,  con el fin D. seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar  (plasticos, carbon, gas) .Sabemos que Cristina  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos D. Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Cristina is 41 years old, lives with her common-law husband, and has three children.  She is currently a member of the 'Mujeres Emprendedoras' (Entrepreneurial Women) community bank which has five members who work in different commercial activities.

Cristina has been selling plastic products, gas and charcoal for ten years.  She works in her district market.  She started out in this line of work because her husband's salary wasn't enough to support their three children and so she set up a business selling plastic products.  Over time, she gathered together some capital and bought charcoal and gas to sell.  Cristina and her husband both worked very hard.  They now have loyal customers and their business continues to grow.  Thanks to her effort and commitment, Cristina has managed to improve their financial income.  She has gradually been buying things for their home, their children have a private education and, above all, her family enjoys a better quality of life.  With the aim of continuing to grow her business, she has requested a new loan to buy plastic products, charcoal and gas.  We know that Cristina will achieve her goals with a lot of work and effort, and the loans from Edaprospo will help her.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (plastic products, charcoal and gas)

loans.name: Najah

texts.en:
Najah is a 46-year-old woman. She is married and has three sons and two daughters. Two of her sons are employed with decent salaries. Her husband works in the grocery store the family has. 

Najah wants to support her husband in expanding the grocery store by purchasing more groceries to have better sales and increase the family income. Najah needs to take a loan in the amount of $3,000 from FATEN. Najah is a conservative woman so her husband is photographed instead.

loans.use: to improve her grocery store by purchasing more groceries for sale.

loans.name: Ketty

texts.es: Ketty tiene 33 años, es una mujer alegra y muy trabajadora, convive con su pareja y sus dos hijos, de 14 y 9 años. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, en donde reina la alegría y la unidad familiar, pero sobre todo las ganas de salir adelante. El trabajo que realiza es la costura, en donde compone cierres, vestidos, pantalones y blusas; así como confecciona nuevos diseños en lencería. Éste trabajo lo aprendió desde muy niña, pero viene ejerciéndolo hace tres años, y hasta el momento esta a gusto con lo que hace, además que le permite tener tiempo para cuidar de sus hijos. Su mayor prioridad es comprar una remalladora, de esa manera le facilitaría la confeccion de prendas intimas y que tengan un buen acabado. Este será el tercer crédito con MFP, por tanto espera la colaboración de todos ustedes para continuar trabajado. Con el monto solicitado, comprará una maquina remalladora y algunos materiales para continuar confeccionando.
texts.en:
Ketty is 33 years old.  She is a cheerful and very hard-working woman who lives with her partner and her two children aged 14 and 9.  They live together in their own home where happiness and family unity reign.  Above all, they have a desire to get ahead in life.

Ketty's business is sewing.  She makes dresses, pants and blouses, and also makes new designs in lingerie.  She learned this work when she was very young and has been working in the business for three years.  Up to now, she is happy with what she does.  In addition, it gives her time to look after her children.  Her main priority is to buy a hemming machine which will help her to sew her lingerie and enable her to finish the garments off well.

This will be Ketty's third loan from MFP.  She hopes to be able to count on your cooperation so that she can continue working.  Ketty will use the sum she has requested to buy a hemming machine and some material so that she can continue sewing.

loans.use: to buy a hemming machine and materials for making lingerie

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es:
Este Comité se formó gracias a la Señora Ramona, es un grupo antiguo, fueron saliendo adelante, cada integrante tiene su propia actividad. Todas ellas son de la ciudad de Villa Elisa. Todas las mujeres son muy trabajadoras y responsables.
Una de las miembros es la señora Ramona, ella tiene una despensa, mediante la cual ella mantiene a su familia y todas las personas que de ella dependen. Comenta que tiene muchas ventas, pues tiene muchos clientes que siempre acuden hasta su despensa. Ella dice que todo lo que hace es por darle a su familia una vida digna y decorosa.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, lácteos y demás, con lo cual podrá aumentar la cantidad de productos que tiene para satisfacer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
This long-standing committee was created thanks to Ramona.  Its members are getting ahead in life and each one of them has their own business activity.  All of the women are from the town of Villa Elisa.  They are all very hard working and responsible. 

One of the members of this group is Ramona, who owns a grocery store.  Through her business, she supports her family and all the people who are dependent on her.  She tells us that she makes a lot of sales as she has many customers who always come to her store.  She says that everything she does is done to provide her family with a decent and respectable life.

Ramona is requesting this loan to buy food, drinks, dairy products, etc.  This will enable her to increase the quantity of products that she has available with which to satisfy her customers.

loans.use: to buy food, drinks, dairy products, etc.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 25-year-old young man. He is a marketing employee with a decent salary. Mohammad wants to prepare for his wedding which is soon. He wants to pay for his wedding expenses such as purchasing home furniture and home appliances...etc. He needs to take a loan in the amount of $2,000 from FATEN to complete the amount he has to pay. When Mohammad takes the loan this will provide for Mohammad better life conditions. Mohammad is photographed in FATEN branch.

loans.use: to pay for wedding expenses.

loans.name: Cumbe Centro (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Cumbe Centro está formado por 5 socias y un socio quienes laboran arduamente en diferentes actividades las mismas que les permiten ayudar y salir  adelante con sus familias. Nuestras socias viven por la parroquia de Cumbe, este  lugar  es de clima frió y nos regala un hermoso paisaje y vista de la naturaleza, su gente mantiene la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos, se dedican al comercio, cría de animales y a la agricultura.

Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la Señorita Andrea, es socia del banco comunal Cumbe Centro, tiene 28 años de edad, es soltera y vive con su padre quien es de profesión chofer y labora prestando sus servicios con su propia unidad de taxi. Comparten los gastos del hogar y la casa en que habitan es propiedad de su padre.
 
Nuestra socia se dedica a la venta de productos Yanbal hace 6 años, vende sus productos todos los días y sin un horario fijo. También en su casa cría de gallinas. 

Se encuentra en el cuarto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos para incrementar su negocio.

Su meta es tener un local para vender sus cosméticos.
texts.en:
The Cumbe Centro Communal Bank is made up of five women and one man who work hard in different activities that allow them to help their families and get ahead with them.  Our members live near the parish of Cumbe.  This place has a cold climate with a pretty landscape and a view of nature.  The people there maintain the culture and traditions of their communities, and they work in commerce, raising animals, and agriculture.

Andrea is one of the members of this group.  She is a member of Cumbe Centro Communal Bank.  She is 28 years old and single, and lives with her father, who is a driver by profession and works for hire with his own taxi.  They share the household expenses, and the house they live in belongs to her father.
 
Andrea has been selling Yanbal cosmetics for six years.  She sells her products every day and without a set schedule.  She also raises chickens at home.

This is the fourth loan she has taken from the communal bank, and she will use her new loan to buy chickens to increase her business.

Her goal is to have a place to sell her cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Nelida Neyda

texts.es:
La Sra. Nelida Neyda vive en la comunidad conocida como Esquilan Chico en la ciudad de Cochabamba. Nelida es soltera y no tiene ningún dependiente a su cargo. Nelida se dedica a la producción de leche cruda aproximadamente 30 litros diarios, esta producción la entrega a la Pil mediante el numero de socio de su hermana.
El siguiente crédito que solicita es para la compra de un tanque de leche enfriamiento (el tanque de enfriamiento es un deposito de leche cruda que se mantiene en buen estado, es de este tanque de donde recoge la Empresa Pil la leche todas las mañanas y todas las tardes) el cual en primer lugar tiene un costo aproximado de 16.000$us, es por esta razón que la compra la están haciendo conjunta con otras 15 personas de la misma comunidad poniendo 1000$us cada uno. Nelida desea que al tener el tanque de enfriamiento cerca de su casa pueda comprar en un futuro una acción de la Empresa Pil Andina y poder entregar leche cruda a su nombre y no al de su hermana.
texts.en:
Señora Nelida Neyda lives in the community known as Esquilan Chico in the city of Cochabamba.  Nelida is unmarried, and has no children.  Nelida works  producing raw milk, approximately 30 liters daily.  She delivers this production to the Pil Company, under her sister's membership.

The loan that she is requesting is to buy a tank for cooling milk (the cooling tank is a place to keep raw milk in good state, and is how the Pil Company receives the milk every morning and evening).  This tank costs approximately $16,000, so for this reason she is making the purchase together with 15 other people in her community, who are putting in $1,000 each.

Nelida wants to able to have a cooling tank near her home, so that in the future she can buy a deed with the Pil Andina Company, and be able to deliver raw milk in her own name rather than that of her sister.

loans.use: to buy a cooling tank for raw milk together with other people.

loans.name: Grace Narcisa

texts.es:
Grace Narcisa tiene 22 años de edad es soltera vive con los padres en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

 La VRC Unión y Progreso la Colombia baja, esta conformada por quince integrantes y está ubicada a 90 minutos de la cooperativa esta ventanilla se dedica a Actividades Agrícolas, siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz, Soya plátano, naranja, etc. 


Grace se dedica a la agricultura, tiene dos hectáreas de terreno ahí siembra cacao, arroz, maíz, soya, plátano  las compras lo realiza en San José del Tambo y los vende en el mercado del local cada fin de semana  tambien se dedica a la crianza de cerdos.

 Solicita el crédito para poder comprar semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, insumos y líquidos para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos para lo posterior venderlos. 

Con el préstamo le ayudará a suplir necesidades económicas, Enfrentar desafíos que son muy frecuentes como la competencia y las plagas. 

El sueño es poderse comprar una casa y más terreno para sembrar más de lo normal para producir y aumentar los ingresos.

En los tiempos libres le gusta salir de paseo con los padres.
texts.en:
Grace Narcisa is 22 years old .  She is unmarried and lives with her parents in the Chillanes canton, province of Bolívar.  “La Unión y Progreso la Colombia Baja” Communal Bank is comprised of fifteen members and is located 90 minutes from the cooperative.  The members of this communal bank work in agriculture and grow cocoa, rice, corn, soy beans, bananas, oranges, and other produce.

Grace is a farmer.  She has two hectares of land and where she grows cocoa, rice, corn, and soy beans.  She shops in San José del Tambo and sells her products in the town market every weekend.  She also raises pigs.  

She is requesting the loan to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, supplies, and liquid fertilizers to maintain her crops in good condition for future sale.
